context.p: To list all the groups a specific user is in:

step.stepresult: Eucalyptus returns a list of the ARNs for the groups the user is in. For example: arn:aws:iam::eucalyptus:group/groupa

context.p: The euare-userlistgroups command lists all the groups a particular user is in. The output lists the ARNs for the groups the user is in.
